column4: hi, the icons and apps on my upper panel are always in  a different position every time i boot, even if i lock them to the panel, what is happening? how do i solve it? thanks
that's a problem with the way the panel is designed, I never was able to fix that either
seems logging out and back in solves the prob
for now, yes. But I've had that issue come back to haunt me l;ater
